data.title: The Silver Toothpick: Samurai Stories
data.meta_description: Seattle: The Hero Louis Press. 1st Edition. Hardcover. Interesting little volume of Samurai tales from lecturer, Public Secretary of the Japan National Diet, and member of the Japanese Diplomatic Corps. Prof Yoon Suk Kim has translated and Madisen Bellm has typed and printed the book at The Hero Louis Press in Seattle. Very good hardcover with some soiling to rear panel in black and white printed jacket that shows some wear
data.text: Seattle: The Hero Louis Press. 1st Edition. Hardcover. Interesting little volume of Samurai tales from lecturer, Public Secretary of the Japan National Diet, and member of the Japanese Diplomatic Corps. Prof Yoon Suk Kim has translated and Madisen Bellm has typed and printed the book at The Hero Louis Press in Seattle. Very good hardcover with some soiling to rear panel in black and white printed jacket that shows some wear and rubbing at spine ends, along edges and at corners. The author has signed as "Kogi" on the ffep. An obscure and entertaining book. Very Good / Very Good. Item #3739
